banner.ticketsSignUp: Sign up to get your spot

info.welcome: Welcome to vOpen! One of the most important community organized set of technology events in Latin America.
info.mission: Our mission is to connect connect students, professionals, experts and organizations from around the world to share knowledge, experiences and promote technological innovation.
info.history: Our history started as .NET Conf, a conference that started five years ago organized in 4 coutries.
info.today: Find out what happened in previous editions

titles.speakersPage: More than 200 experts shared their knowledge
titles.globalTeam: Committed to making a great event

sponsorshipPackages.title: The ${type} package includes
sponsorshipPackages.offer1: Banners and stand in the Conference
sponsorshipPackages.offer2: Push notifications in the Conference Mobile app for raffles and promotions
sponsorshipPackages.offer3: Large-sized stand in a privileged location
sponsorshipPackages.offer3b: Medium-sized stand in a location to be defined by the organization
sponsorshipPackages.offer3c: Small-sized stand in a location to be defined by the organization
sponsorshipPackages.offer4: Possibility of a talk during the conference
sponsorshipPackages.offer7: Branding in the main stage and the coworking space
sponsorshipPackages.offer9: Logo in Conference videos, social network posts and merchandising
sponsorshipPackages.offer12: First come, first served: sponsor Conference lunch
sponsorshipPackages.offer13: First come, first served: sponsor badge and holder
sponsorshipPackages.offer14: Digital sponsor in all vOpen conferences
